content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was at the park with the kids and i saw what i thought were chemtrails so i started to photograph them to show to my friend for his opinion.

2.  i was going back through the pictures after returning home, and noticed a pink flash of light.  i emailed the photos to my friend, who examined them thoroughly, using a huge hdtv to zoom in, and he told me i should report this.

3.  i thought it must be a ufo, seeing as it is unidentifiable thusfar.

4.  according to my photos,  it seems to have moved significantly in aprox. six seconds between the two photos, and in the first one it's a little white circle or saucer looking shape, but the second photo it's in a different spot and it's casting a bright pink light from it.

5.  i just want to know the truth.

6.  i never knew it was there until i got home, which stinks because i'd have loved to been aware and had the opportunity to further photograph this object.

here is a link to the google map of where i took these pics.
http://maps.Google.Com/maps?Um=1&ie=utf-8&q=robert+e+minsky+gym+34953&fb=1&gl=us&hq=robert+e+minsky+gym&hnear=0x88deea3a4ccbe49d:0xd90708a2eee0f25d,port+st+lucie,+fl+34953&cid=0,0,4613978981690610015&ei=wnthtvc1mjgetge54ez6ba&sa=x&oi=local_result&ct=image&ved=0cagq_bi
content.summary: I was taking photos of what i thought may have been 'chemtrails'.  upon viewing photos later that day, i noticed things that i could not see with my eyes while i was photographing the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigerette around 11:30 at night. i then saw a black object hovering in the sky and i rushed to grab my cell phone to try to record it. for some strange reason my cell phone wouldnt work. i looked up and noticed a beam of light shooting out with orbs straight to the ground with theses tall skinny beings. i wanted to go inside but something was prohibiting me too. now the orbs were what i would think to be scanning the area while the beings seemed to be instructing them with some black device. then they made their way towards me and i was beside myself. now there was one that was slightly taller and seemed to be in charge and somehow communicated with me telipathicall, saying that they mean no harm and that they have been studying man for centuries. now one of the orbs scanned what i can explained as a scanner like you would see in a science fiction movie. they were examining me for about 5 to 10 minutes and wanted to go inside but pleaded with the one i was talking to not to go in to protect my family. the strangeast thing happened! he seemed to do a slight bow of respect and slowly walked off my porch and left!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a beam of light then there were theselittle guys being supported by these orbs that were scanning the surroundings.

content.detailedDescription:
While on vacatioln in new mexico there were 3 to 5 lights in the sky that definitely were not planes of any type.  it started with one but were joined by others.  they moved slightly up and down, rather in a box shape but primarily stayed in a small space.  when my friend brought a pair of binoculars out to the patio of the condo we were renting we could see the changes to various colores (red, blue, yellow, green) that you could not see without this aid.

we are aware of the many militariy bases and fovernment facilities in the area of sante fe, but these stayed in one spot for over an hour.  at one point i saw a fast white  line of white light splash quickly through through the night sky.

the next day we left sante fe to continue our tour, driving south in new mexico.  i bought several local newspapers but saw nothing regarding what we witnessed. 

i am very curious if others reported witnessing these.
content.summary: Sighting of 3 - 5 objects in sky over sante fe on 11/2/11

content.detailedDescription:
This happened at least 9 years ago, i simply entered an approximate date above so i can get more information immediately. i am working on finding the exact date and time, but i am extremely eager to see if anyone else in the chicago area saw what we did.  there are several million people within 30nm of my location, i hope to find other people who saw what we did.  maybe they have more details to what we saw, or maybe we can corroborate their sighting as well.

i will have to look in my records to pinpoint the date and time, but i did report the event to the ufo hotline the faa kankakee flight service station gave me the number to:  

as a pilot of 22 years, flying everything from relatively large passenger jet aircraft to aerobatic aircraft i am pretty familiar with objects in the sky.  i have personally seen military flares, astronomical phenomena,  military aircraft, satellites, and nothing compares to what we saw in the cold early morning a few years back.

standing outside in the cold for my friend to smoke,  there was an abnormally bright star in the sky. it gained in brightness and my first reaction was that it must be a commercial flight descending from high altitude above kord (o'hare intl) and that the angle must have been just right to seem as if it was standing still and gaining in intensity as it got closer to us.. but it soon became evident that was not the case.

it was so bright, and so pure a white color that we started looking at the object way before it started moving.  in fact, that is what was so curious about it at first, usually the atmosphere will appear to make something flicker, and show different colors (like a prism).  but there were no navigation lights, no strobes, and it didn't have multiple lights, but rather just that extremely bright light we described. 

 after several minutes of talking to each other the we noticed the object started moving in a zig zag pattern across the sky.  not believing what i was seeing i used fixed objects, the garage roof, power line attached to the house, and side of the house itself as static reference points.  many times people experience a visual illusion of a bright light in darkness - i knew that from flight school.  so i used the fixed points to see if it was in fact moving in a zig-zag pattern or just an illusion.  i then paid very close attention to the power line to ensure it was not swaying - which it was not.  there was no wind, not even a calm wind.  the sky was clear and crisp. other "fixed" objects in the sky kept a relative position compared to it. obviously even the stars move, but over a much longer period of time.  only this one light/object had motion.

given there was no noise, the object had to be very far away or it was silent... and for it to zig sag and turn so abruptly it would cause incredible g-forces on any object.  i felt then, as i do today that there is no reason i can imagine in which this would be an efficient flight path.  we talked about it for several minutes.  

this happened for a few minutes and then the object froze again in the sky and just stayed there for several minutes.  there were no recognition lights, or strobes, or wings, it must have been a round-like object either emitting light or reflecting light from the sun still beyond the horizon.  

then, still without any noise, the object accelerated to an unimaginable velocity in a steep turning arc to the northeast.  we saw it disappear over the houses and ran to the front lawn in an attempt to keep the object in sight longer.  

interestingly, several minutes later a second object seemed to chase after the first object, but rather than coming from a slightly western/overhead object like the first one - this object seemed to come from the south-southwest at an even greater velocity toward the same point the first one went.  

at no time did any of these objects make any noise - and there were other aircraft during this period, from time to time, even at this time of night some traffic continued to either arrive or depart from o'hare.  all the rest of the objects were easy to identify as aircraft, both at low and high altitude.  

im not saying that this was extra-terrestrial, all i know is that it did not portray any known flight characteristics i have ever seen in any aircraft, and that the velocity the objects traveled at the end is beyond anything i have ever seen before.  even at a medium altitude it would have been hypersonic.  yet there was no noise.  and the higher the object was the faster the object was traveling.  it could have been military, it could have been from anywhere - i have no idea.  but one thing is for sure, i have never seen another object like it before or after.  

i am not interested in being on tv - but i would like to find out if there is anything else regarding this sighting from other people.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Airline captain spots incredibly fast objects, also hovered, and zig zaged

content.detailedDescription:
I was working on my car in the parking lot of my fathers garage with a friend, it was about midnight, i was under the car and fred was under the hood, as i pulled myself out from under the car to get something (i was on my back facing the sky)i spotted a bright light, no bigger than the surrounding stars, but it was making a zig-zag pattern across the sky and traversed about 1/4 mile in about 2 seconds, it then lowered at about light speed to about 1500 ft. zipped back to it's original starting point (500 ft. lower) and did it again.
fred and i watched this thing do this 2 more times untill it was at about 500 ft, we could then discern a shape of the thing, it was white and was comprised of three equally sized spheres connected in a triangle by 3 tubes.
as the craft did it's pattern again it veered from the pattern and began to fall toward us as a leaf would from a tree, somewhat erratic but controlled, we fled like scared mice and ran toward the street (about 100yds. from my dad's parking lot) we tried to get two other people to just look up and they would have seen it too but both would not. 
we watched the craft hover above a tree in the yard of a house next to the iga store where we had ran to.
i could have hit the thing with a rock, it was an irridescent white, (like the inside of a clam shell) each sphere was approx. 20ft. in dia. and each sphere was approx. 10 ft. from each other' the thickness of the tubes was about 4-5 ft. i am quite sure of the measurements as i have worked construction all of my life, and having been in the navy i am quite sure of the altitudes also.
we both remember watching this thing above the tree, the entire episode lasted about 20 minutes (to our memory) but niether of us remember going back to the car, we did end up there though and our last recollection is that it was about 3:30 am.
i have watched shows of yours and similar ones as well, i have not seen any other descriptions of this craft in recent years, but i have seen it in the distant past, there was a woman (in oregon i believe) on a similar show who actually painted portraits of the same craft.
if you have no interest in this sighting can you at least put me in touch with someone who has seen the same thing, the afforementioned woman had an up-close and personal encounter, and i srtrongly believe that we have also.

and last but not least, please take this seriously, we have wanted information about this most of our lives, we know what we saw! we know it wasn't from around here! we just want some answers, or to speak to someone who saw the same thing.
thank you very much.
you may contact me for further information if you wish at the number or e-mail i disclosed.
content.summary: Observed object following geometric path, object descended and chased us watched object hover over tree, end of sighting obscured from memory.

content.detailedDescription: At home.                                                                       i alwas look at stars.                                                                      ufo.                                                                        moving in a fuuuy way.                                                                        i felt good to see it.                                                                         it went strate up.
content.summary: I just got home from work saw some lights moving in a funny way, then just went strait up.

content.detailedDescription: When i first saw it, it was right over my head. i was in a restaurant sitting out doors next to the water. i was eating alone so when looked up and saw this strange object and strange light patterns moving so quiet and yet so close i was shocked. i did take out my phone and was able to get video evidence but by the time i started recording the ufo was already on the other side of the bay. i was still able to capture on video the ufo actually disappearing right in front of your eyes and re appear again. it also descended as if to land. i have this evidence on my phone and will be more than happy to show you.
content.summary: All caught on my cell phone must see to believe

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished fishing on a private lease 1/4 mile from city limits.  it lies in the flight path for mid continent airport when winds are from the south.  needless to say, i know what aircraft look like, and the lights on civilian and military aircraft.  i had made a campfire, was listening to music and chilling out by myself.  the owner of the fishing lease (sandpit) was having a get together across the lake and about 20 feet in elevation above me.  i was facing due east.  for some reason i felt compelled to turn around and face the west.  when i did i noticed this round sphere of light moving from west to east appx 500-1000 feet in the air.   it moved slowly, maybe 10-20 mph judging by the distance i observed it in the time allotted.  it moved directly above my head.  as it  was getting nearer to me, i became a bit concerned and decided to grab my nikon d70 camera out of my trunk.  i was a professional photographer in the past.  i figured it was going to get me, at least i would leave evidence!! lol.  anyway, it paused directly overhead of me and i managed to get one pic before it moved off.  the object was pulsating red/white/red/white.  it dissapeared above the tree line.  i went out to the edge of the shore to locate the object but i was unable to see it any longer.  what i found odd was the several people that were on the opposite shore and above my elevation, made no reaction to the object.  i listened to hear if they spotted it, but, there was no indication that they say anything at all.  weird, but, they might not have been looking my direction.  i do have a photo that i want to submit for analysis, which is the very reason i have decided to report this incident anyway.  the object made absolutely no noise, and was not traveling the direction that normal air traffic does common to the this area.
content.summary: A pulsating red/white light slowly moving overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was camping out on my friends farm on the night of saturday may 28th, 2011. at around 1am on that sunday morning i was sitting outside my tent by the fire. i was alone. the night was incredibly clear, i could see the dust of the milky way galaxy and millions of stars. i am an avid star gazer and am familiar for the most part with their locations and how they should appear. i was looking up at the stars a lot that night because it was so clear and they were so beautiful away from the city lights of lexington where i live. at this time( around 1am) i observed nearly directly overhead a huge, bright object. at first i thought it was venus, but it seemed too large, bright and round-like, the edges were nearly clear and also wasn't where venus should be located that time of year. i could not take my eyes off of it for about 45 seconds to 60 seconds. i had no idea what i was looking at, it made no noise, it did not move as if it was a plane or helicopter, it was stationary. i felt a strange connection with the object, this i am really unable to describe. almost as if it were only me and the object out there and not the handful of friends that had gone off into the woods to hike around that night. also almost as if it were watching me. as i began to consider i was perhaps looking at a ufo it abruptly shot off to the right and after about 2 seconds disappeared completely. this to me was the most baffling part. it was no meteor, meteors don't hover for half a minute and while they do disintegrate it is relatively gradual in comparison with how this object just vanished from such brightness. and when it disappeared it was still overhead so it certainly did not go behind the treeline. there was not a single cloud in the sky that night so it didn't vanish into the clouds. for something so bright, that seemed like venus because it did not move, to suddenly vanish into the air intrigues me to this day. a plane sometimes appears very bright when approaching but then as it nears your perspective of it changes and you will notice blinking lights etc. not to mention it will not disappear on a clear night. when it vanished i ran trying to spot it again, it was gone, it literally just blinked out like someone turned the lights off, i know what i saw, it was not man made. i know of no aircraft that can hover, then move so rapidly into another direction, and most importantly vanish seconds later on a clear night away from city light pollution. had it been man-made and for some reason they just turned off the lights(unlikely), the moon was bright enough that it would have still reflected off of it. i have always been a little curious about ufo's, but after i saw this several months ago i have found myself researching ufo's nearly everyday. i cannot stop thinking about what i saw. it is a situation where when i describe it to someone else they dismiss it as one of the things i have mentioned already; a star, a meteor, an aircraft or just look at me like i am crazy. i am a senior in college, i certainly don't want to go around telling people this story and having them believe too many hours of homework have taken their toll if you get my drift. but i was there, i am 27 years old, i've seen all of these things before(planes. meteors, planets), and it was something else. there is no agenda in my sharing this experience, i don't want attention or something. i just feel that your organization could appreciate what i saw and it makes me feel better being able to discuss it to someone who in turn doesn't think i am crazy. again, i know what i saw. i hope this helps you, it has helped me in sharing it. also i wanted to mention i have a camera phone but it had died earlier the day before when i arrived at my friends farm and had it not been dead there was not enough time to grab it and take a picture. i didn't want to let this thing out of my sight.
content.summary: Witnessed a venus like object(thought was venus but seemed to bright and spherical) hovering high in the sky, then shot off to the right and dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was running downstairs like i always do. but this time i smacked the top of my head into the ceiling. after being dazed for a min. i can remeber very clearly seeing two aleins in my back yard when i was younger. im a little kid when this happens. i wake up in the ,iddle of the night. it must be close to morning. the moon is full and so bright thaat its casting a shadow of the tree that used to be there. for some reason i start stareing out into the yard behind mine. when i did this i saw what i thought were two orange balls floating in the yard. as they got closer i could see it was people with orange kind rounded glass helmets with white suits like a space suit but it had two arms that would stick out from either side and at the tips on the bottoms would pulse out these little white rings. but as the ring got closer to the ground the would grow larger somehow creating forses that lifted them over both fences. they didnt travel side by side. one would be about 30 to 40 feet behind the first one.. they went around the right side of my pool then floated over into my backyard. i am still kneeling in my bed with my face in the window and my hands on the bottom. one is in my backyard and the other one is going off to the right when i noticed that the first one was looking at me. it then floated up to my window till i  was staring this person in the face. even thought to colr of the helmet was very bright orange i could tell that it had pale white or a light colord skin its eyes are a little bigger than our eyes but they are completely black. it had a small nose and i didnt notice ears and very thin lips it might not of had them but u could tell it had a mouth. i am looking at this guy for a few seconds and i had no feeling of fear at all i was just in awe, but as soon as it smilied at me my heart sunk. this is when i was going to run staight up to my mom and dads room screaming  for mom. but i got to about mo, before it did somthing to me and i froze dead in the middle of a scream and turn. after that happpend my mind goes blank. i never had any memory of the events before i had hit my head and i have thought about its about everyday since its happend.
content.summary: Two beings enter my backyard late at night

content.detailedDescription: In 2007 my mother told me that she had been abducted by aliens. i was the only person she has talked to about her experience, because i was the only one who believed. so this is her amazing story. my mother awoke one night around 12am in a paralyzed state, she looked over and seen a dozen or so pairs of red eyes, small and beady.But she said at first that was all she could see was their eyes, she said the rest of their bodies were almost invisible. only visible enough to distort the view behind them. she said then that some of them came up to her and began poking her, with their three fingered hands. one of the creatures breathed in her ear, as she said it sounded like what movies typically depict them as sounding. after that the paralyzing feeling lifted, so she got up to walk to the bathroom, hoping she was just dreaming, but all 12-15 small creatures followed her to the bathroom, and then to the kitchen and back to her bedroom, she said they never said anything the whole time they were following her. but they were still semi-see through, and floating behind her as she walked room to room. after she got to her bedroom, she laid down and seen that there was a light in the backyard, so she leaned over to she where the light was coming from, and that is the last she remembers till the next morning, when she woke up. she doesn't remember falling back asleep. which my mother has had insomnia for years and has always had trouble falling asleep, and staying asleep. she never lost sight of them,the whole time all this was happening. but they were gone when she woke up the next day. my sister shared a bed with my mom at that time and was never woken up or disturbed during the whole event. my mother has nothing to gain from making up such a story, if anything it has caused people to look at her like she is crazy. but upon researching the type of small humanoid she seen, i found many abduction victims reported the same semi-see through creature with read eyes, and is the size of a small child
content.summary: My mother was abducted by aliens, small, with red

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my home, smoking an evening, after dinner cigar. i live on a flight path going into pensacola fl airport. i glanced to the ne at a very bright light. at first i thought it was an inbound commercial aircraft, with the landing spotlights on. it was so bright. as it got closer, i could see it was very bright on the bottom but the top portion was red. glowing red, almost translucent. it was also quite large. i thought of a bright red, clear ruby, shaped like a hot air balloon but it was moving way fast. i watch it disappear into the distance. (in a ssw direction)i was beside myself trying to think of what it could have been. i keep looking in the direction it went and tryed to decide if i should call 911 or the sheriffs dept. i decided against that. i then returned to where i had been sitting (on the diving board of my swimming pool) when i notice another bright light coming from the same direction and the same altitude. i'll be damned if it wasn't another one exactly like the first one that had just disappeared. it was like an instant replay of the first one. it also disappeared into the distance. it is very difficult to measure the total time but i think it was possibly 15 minutes from start to finish. there were no commercial aircraft at that time and this thing was totally silent. this all really confused me because my brain could not tell me what i was looking at. i have let over a month pass before reporting this but i just can't get it out of my mind. what the heck did i see? it was a clear, cool, calm, beautiful evening. it was shaped like a incandesent light bulb. with the bottom, screw in part very bright, white light, with the upper glass part, glowing bright red and translucent.
content.summary: First thought was aircraft. it was not a plane. it was very bright on the botton and glowed red in a translucent manner on the upper part of craft. shaped like a hot air ballon or light bulb.

content.city: Tracy ca over the lab bac
content.detailedDescription: Please just call
content.summary: Hoverd over almont hills tracy ca beam of light on the hill un next day
content.locationName: Tracy ca over the lab bac, California

content.detailedDescription:
This all began last night when around 8 pm, while in the kitchen our lights began to flicker. we thought nothing of it. weather maybe? then at 11pm while watching a movie, my boyfriend & i noticed from the window that there was something weird w the sky, despite the blinds being completely closed. we opened them and witnessed the densely cloudy/snowy sky, become incredibly illuminated 2 separate times, by bright organge/green and mostly blue flashes of lights. like lightening but with out the bolt.  just light.  it had been a very cold snowy day, the sky at this time was extremely cloudy and dense there is no way this could have been siren lights or a plane or helicopter.  there was about a 5 min lapse between our 2 sightings of the flashing lights. the 1st lasted about 10 seconds. the 2nd was just quick.  we camped out on our porch waiting for more but never saw any more.  we heard others on our block from their windows screaming "come look, it is happening again" this was from about 11-1130pm est.Also, after the 2 light occurrances we'd witnessed, sirens went off each time, but for a very brief period of time. however, over the hill across from our apt, the sky was dark gray and cloudy with the exception of a portion in the trees on the hill - it looked like how headlights illuminate a foggy night, you cannot see the individual 2 headlights but rather you see a bright white illumination coming your way. it was mostly stationary and broad. but sorta shifted from right to left at one point. very slowly. almost unnoticeable. again this was not a beam or singular light, but a white glowing on the hill through the pine trees. 
my boyfriend and i immediately posted our experience, albeit small and explainable, online via facebook.  immediately there were responses of other witnesses from all over our small western pa town.  one friend, said she had been closing up at work at the mall around 9pm and the entire department store went pitch black. the local mall is about 20 minutes from my home.  ironically the mall is also within a few miles of the military base and a small local airport.  my boyfriend works very close to the airport and when he left work that evening at about 445pm he said a certain road was closed off, and there was a detour. there was a fire truck and policeman directing traffic.  on this particualr day, we had our 1st real snow/winter occur.  however, he saw no real reason why a road was closed or why there would be officials directing traffic.  the roads were not good but they were not horrible. people from all over town responded on facebook saying they had flickering lights or a power outage in their homes or business. my mother had called me telling me when going home from work she witnessed a slew of police and fire engines driving like mad in one direction towards a main street that is located between the mall and where i live. 

here are a couple of posts from my facebook newsfeed of individuals who actually saw some crazy stuff in the sky!!  i have given them this link and have urged them to report their stories as mine pails in comparison to what they witnessed.  

"about 11 pm my husband went to the gas station in moxham. but then called home to tell us about "flashes" of freaky rainbow colored lights. of course we laughed at him and told him to shut him up, but then we looked out the window... it was as if there were a stage light from overhead with a lens that would change colors with each flash of light. we saw red, then orange, yellow, then green. it would flash blue a little longer than the other colors. richland direction looked really bright and towards moxham it was very dark grays and black. the lights did seem the brightest looking up through the gully towards walters ave/ galleria direction (where the mall and military bases are located).It was so bright it was like daylight. if you find out what it was, please post it because had we not seen this ourselves, we wouldn't have believed it. my husband said also said he and his friend saw the colored lights earlier along with 2 silver balls of light. it was only when it the flashing colorful sky happened, that he decided to call and tell me."

" so -- good to know im not crazy and that others saw this..I was headed home from work late last night & i was talking to my boyfriend on my cell & i abruptly stopped & was like "woah what is that?" i saw blueish like flashing coming from the sky. i thought maybe it was cops or an ambulance siren but there was none around. i was on the highway and would have seen them. then, what i thought at 1st was a shooting star,came straight down on the right hand side of 219 (highway) and descended into the woods. when it came closer it was a bright green ball of light. it was strange & i thought "i am crazy". lol"

unfortunately no one was able to capture anything on video or a picture.
content.summary: Strange intense colorful flashing lit up sky/power outages or flickering lights/witnesses saw balls or star like objects in sky white/greenish very bright

content.detailedDescription: While taking digital pics of the town square for the holidays on dec. 02,2011 i saw a quick flash that appeared like a shooting star only moving a bit slower.It had a puplish blue light and was moving fast.I only caught it for a few quick seconds,but noticed it's color and that it did have a tail of sorts as it moved.It was out of sight on a 4 count.It was very bright and left a bright trail behind it and that quickly dissipated as fast as the object disappeared.When we examined our pics there were two images of the object with the buildings in the gettysburg square as persepective and the object as it moved in two different pics.It was gone as quickly as it came.Moved so quickly we could not follow it.
content.summary: Saw a quick puple flash out of the corner eye.Then the entity showed on digital

content.detailedDescription: I saw star like light,witch i think thy are to low to be stars.So i started recording them ever nite as thy hover throw the nite,me and my girlfrined and other frineds notes the odjects in the sky.The odject spinning,bright middle light,with lots of colors,i review my recording on my 32;in. t.V.I see light towers,blinking lights,windows.And body like figers.Mufon,the only way to beleive is see.Its scary to see things like this over us.Makes me wonder whats going on
content.summary: I want to know if its real obect ufo or goverment in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i went to the beach on monday afternoon...It was a beautiful afternoon and we decided to hang down there for the last couple of hours of sunlight. my wife usually takes her binoculars with her, she checks out the boats and hopes to see things like manatees and dolphins.
i noticed a contrail out over the ocean way up there. it appeared to be a commercial jet. now commercial jets around here are not unusual. we're on the glide path to palm beach international airport and they usually break the coast around here at about 5000 feet. (i know it's 5000 feet because the last time i flew back here and we went over our house and i checked the altitude thing on the screen of my seat.) but this one was at cruise altitude, 35-40,000 feet. i pointed it out to my wife who looked at it through her binoculars.
she looked at it and said "what's that behind the jet?" so i looked up and there was another object basically on the same path as the jet about 4 inches (from our perspective)behind it. i took the binoculars to look at it. it did not have a contrail which led me to beleive it wasn't as high as the commercial jet. i thought at first it might be a small private jet. but i could not see any wings or tail, and the back third of the object was glowing a burnt orange.
i watched through the binoculars for a couple of minutes. it was on a straight path. then it started to turn to the left and then it just disappeared. 
there was no sound. but then again we couldn't hear the commercial jet that preceeded it either.
i'm not saying this is extraterrestrial. but since i have no idea what it was i'd say it was a ufo.
my wife just read this and she said it looked to her like a squid without tentacles and glowing at the back end.
any ideas?
content.summary: Object, very high, looked through binoculars and it was not an airplane

content.detailedDescription: Man i was walking from trying to trade a few games in and i looked up and there it was ...At first i thought it was a plane but as i keep walking towards the ally way near my house while crossing the street i noticed it didn't move it just sat there and it was shinny as hell it was just reflecting so as i am thinking all of this while crossing the street i said to my self planes move they just dont sit there like that??? so i ran back to the middle of the street and it was gone i mean it just dissapeared it was gone and i keep walking back to my house just thinking am i tripping or did i just see i ufo man am telling you it was no plane planes move and if it was wear the hell did it go that fast there are no clouds out here i live in onley philadelphia and i was walking towards 5th and wellens i seen it on fisher 5th and fisher that is looking down the street way up in the air it was shinny as hell man and it didnt even move soon as i walked back it was gone man and no plane does that that ive ever seen i wish i had my phone on me but i didnt stop to even think
content.summary: Man i was walking from trying to trade a few games in and i looked up and there it was ...At first i thought it was a plane but as i keep walking towards the ally way near my house while crossing the street i noticed it didnt move

content.detailedDescription: Driving to wingstop from my house at about 8:45 pm on 12/7/11 i saw three orange orbs in a triangle formation. they moved together as if connected but i couldnt see if they actually were or not. they were moving away from me and appeared to descend slightly and bank slightly. they were obviously not airplane lights or anything like that. after around 8-10 seconds of looking at them they kind of went out, almost like they entered a cloud, but there were no clouds and they would have been to low to have entered a cloud anyways.  almost full moon and no clouds at all. they just kind of shimmered for a second and then disappeared. second "ufo" ive seen this year and third one in my life.
content.summary: Three orange orbs, moved together as if connected

content.detailedDescription:
Just read report from mo, us: motivated me to report our sighting from last year...
two witnesses, a little after 9pm. late october, 2010. ontario canada.
we were outside looking at stars on clear cold night, fullish moon was behind us, behind house not causing much light pollution, but did illuminate a few wispy clouds low in the horizon in direction we were looking.
a dark craft's appearance in front of the 'litup' clouds caught my attention. i would guess for the first 3/4 or 1 second i was thinking 'wow a stealth bomber', but within a second or so my mind realized something was weird about this craft which was flying approx. south to north across our field of view.
less than 2 seconds after first sighting the craft, it made a few violent horizontal zig zag motions (no banking, while not moving forward) completely defying physics. without moving forward it almost immediately, shifted its position a couple hundred feet away from us, then a few hundred feet closer (i.E. 200 ft away, then 400 ft back so closer), then a third zag so was about half way back to its original location, then continued on its original flight path. (approx south to north) 
the craft was dark triangle wider than long, similar in ratio to the b2 stealth bomber (without the cutouts at back). it was approx. 500-1000 ft away at approx. 200-500 ft above ground. like report from mo,us the characteristics that were the most striking were the complete absence of sound and the way it slipped through the air 'gliding' at such a smooth and constant rate (other than the brief zig-zag) that it stood out as odd. i have thought about that many times, and my best guess is that when we see an airplane moving through the air it must have tiny fluctuations in velocity, yaw, altitude or combination that are extremely tiny but that we can register. and when an object moves in front of you with an exact smooth path, with zero fluctuations in path or speed it stands out as looking odd.
anyway, the craft we saw did not appear to have the mist that you describe around it, but did appear to have a very faint distortion of atmosphere around it, maybe heat waves ? the craft had several very very very dim lights clustered around the wing tips approx. 5/6 per side. the 'lights' did not appear to be emitting light but closer to infrared (similar in some ways to the infrared leds on security cameras). this is not a case where 'we think we saw something', this thing was pretty close, could see the shape clearly. if it was a plane it would have been very loud, but no (zero) sound. unfortunately because of the angle and darkness we did not get a good idea of how thick the craft was (height). we can describe and draw (we did) the bottom shape of the craft with some detail, but sorry no info on 3d shape and detail on top.
the craft traveled away from us, then it simply vanished. we were looking at it, it was darker than the sky behind it, as it got farther away (< 1 km away) we just instantly lost sight of it. could be that it just faded into night sky, but it did feel as though it instantly disappeared... 
total duration of sighting 6-8 seconds.
content.summary: Re: large dull black craft

content.detailedDescription:
My dog awoke me at approx. 4:30 a.M. was wining. about 1 minute after awaking to my dog, my bed (only thing that i noticed) was shaking -- quite a bit. i know this sounds crazy! i thought we were having an earthquake. it must have just been my bed shaking. the walls are not cracked. 

once the shaking and rumbling stopped i noticed outside...

my blinds were lifted so i could see outside as i was laying on my side -- i saw a circle with lights, swirling (it was so fast) the outside was glowing like it was on fire (was disc shaped appeared flat). i thought it was something that was going to crash. this object was not far off the ground; i want to say about 10-15 feet.

i called the police. my 911 call did not register (on phone calls made) and there was static on the line for a brief period. i had asked the dispatch officer if they could hear me -- they said yes, so i thought it was on my end. i just noticed on my cell phone when checking to see exact time i called the police and noticed the call back from the officer was registered on my phone (not the 911 call).
content.summary: Ufo milan, michigan

content.detailedDescription: I am currently in auckland, new zealand for 6 weeks and i am staying in a 7th floor apartment in the central city. thought i'd check out what stars i could see from my window so did a google for star software and found and opened yoursky and set it up for auckland horizon view southwest. looked out the window and saw a bright light in the sky (with long rays due to my eyes being temporarily short sighted from hyperbaric oxygen treatment) and thought probably not a plane. no other stars visible and light just starting to fade. thought i'd take a couple of photos on 20x zoom with my canon g11 and was surprised at that zoom it was a round sphere so thought it was maybe a planet. checked software and figured must be venus. omg looked out window 20 minutes later and it wasn't there. 10 minutes later thought i saw same light a little dimmer moving across sky and then suddenly diving straight down behind the building. tried taking another photo of sky to show no light but camera had trouble focusing due to lack of light. finally managed to take photo with manual settings and wider zoom, now dark. photos attached showing sphere above 13 storey building opposite my apartment, first with flash on 20x zoom, second with no flash 20x zoom, third with no sphere taken at wider zoom in dark. the sphere is near to the left hand mast on top of the building in first 2 photos.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light stationery, disappeared, reappeared moving and then descending

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 1225am on thursday december 8, 2011. i had just finished watching a movie at a friends house and was in her front yard speaking to her before i left. as i was facing her, behind her to the northwest i saw what appeared to be just over the tree tops and houses in the subdivision i observed a bright white/yellow light. as soon as i saw the first light, almost a second or so later i so another light identical to the first light up directly parallel and to the left to the first. i exclaimed and drew the attention of my friend. as she turned and looked a third light illuminated again directly parallel and to the left of the other two lights. all three lights hovered and stayed illuminated for approximately 3 to 4 seconds then completely disappeared. we kept watching the sky in the same spot we had seen the lights and after watching for approximately 30 seconds or so a forth light appeared a considerable distance from were we saw the other three. it hovered and was completely stationary for a few seconds then another light appeared in the exact spot that i had observed the initial series of three lights. the last light that illuminated appeared to be in the exact spot that the second light i initially had observed had been. these two lights stayed illuminated for approximately 10 seconds and then disappeared. none of the lights i saw ever moved, and the three initial ones all appeared to be lit up in a perfectly straight line with some distance apart from each other. 
i attempted to use my cell phone camcorder to record the lights however by the time i could get the camera up and running the lights were never seen again. all i could record was the exact area they were seen, and our reaction right after they disappeared. we watched the area for another 10 or 15 minutes and never saw anything else.
i've been a law enforcement officer for 9 years, and my friend that was with me been a cop for almost 10 years. i've also grown up on southside savannah near the army air base and i've never seen anything like that. i can say with 100% confidence it was not a plane and it was not a helicopter. i don't know a lot about flares but i can't imagine that one would only light up for a few seconds. additionally i can't see how someone could shoot three flares moments apart had have them all line up in an exact straight line from each other had stay completely stationary. also the forth light that was seen based on my best guess of the distance had it been a flare fired from the ground someone would have had to have been a considerable distance even miles from the other three then fifth light. i also never heard any planes, or sounds at all indicating that these lights could have been coming flares fired off by a plane playing war games. the definitely were not in rapid session in the manner in which i've seen flares fired from fighter aircraft before.
content.summary: Four to five blight lights seen for a matter of seconds

content.detailedDescription: Just dropped son off at work when i noticed that an airplane was coming from the west towards the airport.  it flew past the airport and it slowed down and descended to level off over the freeway.  it was traveling too slow to be an airplane.  but faster than a baloon or zeppelin. i've always wanted to see a ufo again but this one scared me.  i was very frightened and i couldn't take a picture because the trafic around me was going too fast for me to stop.  i kept telling myself that it was an airplane but when it passed me there were not any other lights like on an airplane. no red or blue lights.  two helicopters were searching for something on the ground on the west side of town from the direction of where the ufo came. the ufo seemed to be in the form of a straight line.  the lights were evenly spaced. the outer lights blinked but not at the same time and the lights were not headlights from an airplane.  they weren't that bright. after i arrived at home which would have been about 10 minutes later, i looked up into the sky and noticed a huge com trail and that the helicopters were still actively searching for something about 10 or 15 miles or so from downtown albuquerque.  my estimations may be incorrect. i looked on the internet to see if there are any airplanes with that type of lights but could not find any.  i then looked up on youtube and realized that the lights of the ufo were the same as witnessed in arizona. i'm still pretty shaken up and my blood pressure went up.  i have a headache and still very scared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Three white lights coming from the direction of airport but it didn't take off from the airport and it was over the freeway traveling south to north.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out for a late evening walk in an area of lee's summit, mo, known as john knox village.  i was walking north parallel to pryor road and as i ascended a small hill i happened to look up.  there was an object descending and coming towards me which at first i took to be a small plane on a very dangerous downward trajectory.  after a moment, i realized this very dark, lightless, craft (i can't think of what else to call it), was no plane at all.  it was surrounded by a cloudy mist which seemed rather strange considering the night was cold and very clear.  it seemed to be descending into my line of sight.  it was, and this is the most startling thing, i think, absolutely silent.  more than silent, it was almost as if it were surrounded by a vacuum of some sort.  it descended into my line of sight at maybe 70 to 100 yards distant and perhaps 50 to 70 yards off the ground.  i couldn't see the entire craft (again, i don't know what else to call it), but what i could see looked vaguely triangular and i could make out lines on it; straight lines running along it, so i knew it was something manufactured, not organic in any sense.  it descended closer to me and lower to the ground when i spooked and turned around and walked quickly southward with my back to it.  it was moving east to west along chipman road, very close to a shopping center.  i can't possibly be the only person who saw this thing, it was practically on the ground.  it moved effortlessly through the sky, drifting almost downward which is why my first impression was that it was a plane about to crash almost directly in front of me.  it moved, as best as i can describe it, rather like the puck moves on an air hockey table.  it was traveling no faster than 15 or 20 miles per hour and was semi-concealed in a whitish mist.  it was, i must reiterate, absolutely silent and showed no indication of battling wind resistance or of having any visible means of locomotion.  
i wish i had not spooked so quickly and had taken a longer and more careful estimate of what was quite literally right in front of me.  again, i can not give any definitive description of the size or shape of the craft, it was partially obscured by a mist/fog/cloud that it seemed to be moving along within.  the experience lasted somewhere around 10 seconds before i turned away from it.  
this may be a silly and erroneous sort of thought, but i had the distinct impression that it had moved itself into my line of sight deliberately; almost as if it were showing itself to me.  at no point did i feel menaced or threatened, in fact, the whole encounter had an almost playful feel to it, as if they or it or whatever wanted me to see it.  i can not describe the trajectory otherwise as it descended quite deliberately into my immediate line of sight.  this occurred approximately two and one half hours before this posting, so it is fresh in my mind.
content.summary: Large dull black craft descended from within and then out of a misty cloud directly into my line of sight.  absolutely silent.  no lights whatsoever.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking home from university of colorado campus. looked up while about to cross the street and saw a glowing, pulsating, white/yellowish orb above boulder's flatirons (foothills). this orb appeared to be identical to much other footage i have seen of such things, however it appeared by itself whereas the majority of other footage seems to include more than one orb. 

i viewed the object for about 10 min total. i decided to go onto the rooftop of a nearby building to get a better view, but when i did so, the angle of that location, the orb, and the foothill between caused the orb to be obscured from my view. i went to my car to drive up and over to the foothill, but had very little gas so i decided to just go home. in addition, my phone was about to die and i had no other device with which to record; i thought going to that length, it would have been pretty upsetting to have my phone die on me and not be able to document anything. 

i know the orb was not astronomical in nature. i am familiar with the night sky, and while it was early evening at the time, i could very clearly see jupiter near the moon. if the object were a normal star or planet, i conclude that it is very unlikely to have been brighter, and appearing larger than jupiter especially at dusk. 

i know the object was not a man made air craft because it remained stationary in the sky for a period of about thirty minutes, and there were airplanes in the sky at the time which were clearly very different in appearance. in addition, the way this orb pulsated was unlike any man made craft i have ever seen.

it may be worthwhile to note that the orb appeared over park land, the map i included shows an approximate range of where i thought the object appeared.
content.summary: Single stationary pulsating orb above the foothills of boulder co

content.detailedDescription:
The very first time an event occured i was visiting my mother in the next county over and my husband called my mothers phone and asked me to go outside and wanted to know if i could see the same thing.When i made it to the front porch i had a very clear veiw of the whole night sky and thier was a dime sized looking orbing moving strangly across the sky.It was very bright and looked as if it was just a star, so initially i just dismissed the occurance as a satalite or something of that nature.
 the next time i saw the object it was barely dusk. i saw what i thought was a very bright star on the horizon.The object seemed like it was getting bigger and moving closer, but my husband and i were driving down a winding road, so i stayed will my initial thoughts on it being a bright star. until it looked as if it were right on top of us following our car down the road...I got this feeling like whatever it was knew i saw them. i told my husband i thought i was seeing the weird orb again but by the time he looked we thought it was gone,so he had me open the sun roof and it was directly above our car., as soon as he noticed it also it changed course and dissapered into the mountains.
this third and last time my husband and i were coming home just after dusk driving down i-5 on the way back home we were coming down the mountain back to our home and i s=again saw this bright light but did not think it was the same thing...Until we got closer i started to watch it move this time i was ready and got one picture off before my camera quit working ,i had my husband pull to the side of the road at the bottom of our driveway so i could take a picture on my digital camera,we were sitting still with my arm rested and the oobject also looked to be stationary at the time of the photo,but when i looked at the pic it looked like it was a strand of christmas lights or something.
thanks for your time in reading and if there was any info you would like to know i left out please contact.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My family and comunity has been seeing unusual glowing orbs...With we know are not planes!

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside work with two others i notice lights in the sky not a helicopter or airplane, they got brighter then went out, they them appeared to the left maybe 8 miles over then brightened and went out twice, there were at least five of them 3 were in a line and the other two to the left , either the object was huge or they were all separate lights but came on and went off all together, they then disappeared and did not return.
content.summary: Lights appeared got bright then slowly went out

content.detailedDescription:
I picked up the grandkids from the sitter and was getting them in the car. i was about to close the passenger side door of the car when my 7 1/2 year old grandaughter, in the back seat passenger side, said, "look, the moon is moving."  so i looked up (up and to the east)and explained that it was the clouds that were moving fast past the moon which looked almost full but not quite.  then, i noticed a large, maybe circular, kind of fuzzy edges, but not sure, shadow below to the left of the moon.  it appeared to be moving back and forth when all of a sudden, it shot across the sky, still behind the moving clouds, to the right (south) then down then south like a zorro elongated "z" and then disappeared behind heavier clouds.  after that i thought i may have seen a very distant airplane further to the south in a break in the clouds by virtue of the lights and movement.  my grandaughter immediately said, "what was that?  a big bird, a shooting star?"  i couldn't believe she saw it, too and i told her that i saw it and was excited because i had never seen anything like it. she even said that maybe it was an alien ship and i said it does seem like a ufo.  we talked about how all of a sudden there were no clouds by the moon anymore, only to the south.  anyway,.......My bad....She is terribly upset and frightened now, thinking it's an alien ship.  now, we are hoping it was santa practicing his run....This was amazing and highly unusual and i may have dismissed it if she didn't see it, too.

(names moved to fi box)  cms 12/07/11 20:31 cst flg
content.summary: While looking at clouds passing the moon, a large shadow appeared below and behind clouds, hovered slightly back and forth then shot to the south behind misty clouds then disappeared. both grandaughter and myself observed at same time.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend awoke me early monday morning, about 6:30 am, it was still dark outside. i could hear the urgency in her voice and i quickly leapt out of bed.  i went out back to see what she was looking at, and there was a bright yellowish greenish light in the sky just above the treetops to our south. i went back in to grab the binooculars as it seemed fairly far away.  it first appeared to be static, but withing seconds looked as if the lights were pulsing and changing shape, and sometimes just completely shutting off, with a faint outline of the dark object, and a single dim red light in the center.  fairly soon after watching it, it hovered/floated slowly out of view.
then the following evening, after we had finished up the work day, my girlfriend was on the back porch, having a smoke, and i hear her again calling for me to come quick.  it was a little after 6 pm and i went for the binoculars again, and got a good view of it.  this time the object appeared to be yellow-orange and the light was more in the shape of an oval. it may have been slightly closer this time, but it seemed larger thand just the outline of the light.  then it acted the same as before, shutting the bright light on and off. when the light was off, even though it was dark you could still make out a faint outline of the object, hard to tell the shape though.  creepy.
content.summary: Yellow lights sighted twice southeast of eureka, california
